channel.title: Characters on Morphic Graphic Novel Series
channel.description: Recent content in Characters on Morphic Graphic Novel Series

item.description: This mysterious Morphic appears to early settlers and, over a century later, reappears near Lane’s house where Errie found the stone.
Despite her cold, critical attitude, Sirena jumps into action to save the humans of Ash Root from the urgent threat of a nearby Rogue.
In addition to his loyalty and tender heart, Canissandro seeks boldly to make up for his mistakes–especially that which brought Capri to Ash Root.
A stubborn Goat Morphic with a chip on his shoulder, Capri angrily denies Errie and Lane’s observation of the unnatural plant growth protruding from his back.
As suddenly as she appears to plead for Errie’s help, this mysterious girl vanishes into thin air.

Chan’s dedication to building the “best remote-control car ever” prevents him from joining his friends Errie and Lane on their adventures in the woods, but he accepts the costume they got him to wear at the festival later.
As Errie’s best friend with a concern for others’ safety, Lane wastes no time to check out Errie’s alert about someone in danger in the woods.
While Errie waits to attend a local festival, an unnamed girl seeks her help in the woods and there Errie meets a Rogue Morphic.
